title: Ep93 Ex Pat Crimes
description: This week, the gals head east to check out some gory stories from the Motherland. Cases include a spritely set of Uranian maniacs, a killer addicted to both sex and socks, and a seriously sick teacher with a thing for his students. This episode is paired with Salient Cabernet Sauvignon, so get out your Slovak translation guide, buckle the f**k up, and tune in for Eastern European Serial Killers. This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $45 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
